task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 341°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full vertical extent of the main building to estimate height, so I should tilt the camera upward while staying facing north.
The building’s roofline is visible from this upward view, and it appears to be about 4 stories (~3 m per story) plus parapet, giving roughly 13 m total height.
